TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit SecurityTokenResolver extends System.Object implements class System.IdentityModel.Configuration.ICustomIdentityConfiguration

Docs.summary: Represents a utility class that can retrieve security tokens or keys when you have a key identifier or key identifier clause.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Use the SecurityTokenResolver class to retrieve a key or security token when you have a key identifier or key identifier clause. The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenResolver.ResolveToken%2A> and <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenResolver.TryResolveToken%2A> methods retrieve a token given that there is a key identifier or key identifier clause. The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenResolver.ResolveSecurityKey%2A> and <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenResolver.TryResolveSecurityKey%2A> retrieve a key given that there is a key identifier clause. The methods with a `Try` prefix return `false` when the retrieval is unsuccessful, whereas the methods without a `Try` prefix throw an exception.

MemberSignature.Value: protected SecurityTokenResolver ();

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: public static System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenResolver CreateDefaultSecurityTokenResolver (System.Collections.ObjectModel.ReadOnlyCollection<System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken> tokens, bool canMatchLocalId);

.method public static hidebysig class System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenResolver CreateDefaultSecurityTokenResolver(class System.Collections.ObjectModel.ReadOnlyCollection`1<class System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken> tokens, bool canMatchLocalId) cil managed

Docs.param: A <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ReadOnlyCollection%601> of type that contains the set of security tokens for which this security token resolver can resolve key identifiers and key identifier clauses to.
to resolve the key identifier clauses that reference a security key that is located somewhere else in the SOAP message; otherwise, .
Docs.summary: Creates a default security token resolver for the specified security tokens.
Docs.returns: A that resolves key identifiers and clauses that match the security tokens specified in the parameter.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The security token resolver that is returned from this method, uses the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken.MatchesKeyIdentifierClause%2A> and <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken.ResolveKeyIdentifierClause%2A> methods on the specified security tokens to resolve key identifiers and key identifier clauses.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual void LoadCustomConfiguration (System.Xml.XmlNodeList nodelist);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void LoadCustomConfiguration(class System.Xml.XmlNodeList nodelist) cil managed

Docs.summary: When overridden in a derived class, loads custom configuration from XML.

remarks.format: ## Remarks By default, throws a <xref:System.NotImplementedException>. You can override this method to provide functionality in a derived class.

MemberSignature.Value: public System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKey ResolveSecurityKey (System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifierClause keyIdentifierClause);
.method public hidebysig instance class System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKey ResolveSecurityKey(class System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifierClause keyIdentifierClause) cil managed

Docs.param: A to retrieve the key for.
Docs.summary: Obtains the key that is referenced in the specified key identifier clause.
Docs.returns: A that is the key referenced in the specified key identifier clause.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenResolver.TryResolveSecurityKey%2A> and ResolveSecurityKey methods differ in what happens when the key identifier clause cannot be resolved to a key. The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenResolver.TryResolveSecurityKey%2A> method returns `false`, whereas the ResolveSecurityKey method throws an exception.

Docs.exception: A key could not be retrieved for the key identifier clause specified in the parameter.

MemberSignature.Value: public System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken ResolveToken (System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifier keyIdentifier);
.method public hidebysig instance class System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken ResolveToken(class System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifier keyIdentifier) cil managed

Docs.param: The to create a security token for.
Docs.summary: Retrieves a security token that matches one of the security key identifier clauses contained within the specified key identifier.
Docs.returns: A that represents the specified key identifier.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenResolver.TryResolveToken%2A> and ResolveToken methods differ in what happens when the key identifier cannot be resolved to a security token. The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenResolver.TryResolveToken%2A> method returns `false`, whereas the ResolveToken method throws an exception.

Docs.exception: A security token cannot be created for the specified key identifier.

Docs.summary: Retrieves the security token that matches the specified key identifier clause.
Docs.returns: A that represents the specified key identifier clause.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenResolver.TryResolveToken%2A> and ResolveToken methods differ in what happens when the key identifier clause cannot be resolved to a security token. The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenResolver.TryResolveToken%2A> method returns `false`, whereas the ResolveToken method throws an exception.
